name: Ghostdoku
description:
Ghostdoku is a 2D mobile game in which you play as on old woman visiting her husbands grave and discovers that she can communicate to the ghosts in the graveyard. Play sudoku to help ghosts remember their pasts and move on. The more memories unlocked, the more the graveyard restores itself and the closer you get to unraveling a murder mystery.

Our game was created for mid-core mobile gamers that enjoy playing puzzle games like sudoku and narrative games. Or even for anyone who feels like they would want a bigger reward for completing sudoku puzzles.
